description.zh-cn: 中国作家、社会活动家、文艺评论家、人权活动家，2010年诺贝尔和平奖得主。《零八宪章》的主要起草人之一，毕生致力于宣传及参与旨在终结中国共产党一党专政的中国民主运动，多次被拘捕判刑。
description.en: A Chinese writer, social activist, literary critic, and human rights activist, and the 2010 Nobel Peace Prize laureate. He was one of the main drafters of Charter 08 and dedicated his life to promoting and participating in the Chinese democracy movement aimed at ending the one-party rule of the Communist Party of China, for which he was repeatedly arrested and sentenced.

description.zh-cn: 1989年在中国发生的一系列学生和民众抗议活动，以政府武力清场告终。
description.en: A series of student-led and popular protests in China in 1989, which ended with a violent crackdown by the government.

description.zh-cn: 一份于2008年12月10日发表的宣言，呼吁言论自由、人权和自由选举。刘晓波是主要起草人之一。
description.en: A manifesto published on December 10, 2008, calling for freedom of speech, human rights, and free elections. Liu Xiaobo was one of its main authors.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

description.en: The Nobel Peace Prize awarded to Liu Xiaobo for his "long and non-violent struggle for fundamental human rights in China."

nodes.id: 我没有敌人——我的最后陈述

zh-cn: 我没有敌人——我的最后陈述
en: I Have No Enemies: My Final Statement

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波在2009年庭审时的最后陈述，阐述其“没有敌人，也没有仇恨”的理念。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo's final statement at his 2009 trial, in which he articulated his philosophy of 'I have no enemies, and no hatred'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波出生于中华人民共和国吉林省长春市。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo was born in Changchun, Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波于1977年考入吉林大学中文系，1982年毕业并获得文学学士学位。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo was admitted to the Chinese Department of Jilin University in 1977 and graduated in 1982 with a Bachelor of Arts degree.

degree.en: Master of Arts, PhD in Aesthetics

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波于1982年考入北京师范大学中文系攻读硕士，1984年获硕士学位；1986年成为该系博士研究生，1988年获博士学位。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo enrolled in the Chinese Department of Beijing Normal University for his master's degree in 1982, receiving it in 1984; he became a doctoral candidate in the same department in 1986 and received his PhD in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波获得博士学位后留校任教，后因参与六四事件于1989年9月被开除公职。
description.en: After receiving his doctorate, Liu Xiaobo remained at the university as a lecturer, but was dismissed from public office in September 1989 for his involvement in the June Fourth Incident.

description.zh-cn: 陶力是刘晓波的第一任妻子，两人于六四事件后离婚。
description.en: Tao Li was Liu Xiaobo's first wife; they divorced after the June Fourth Incident.

description.zh-cn: 刘霞是刘晓波的第二任妻子，两人于1996年11月结婚，婚姻关系持续至刘晓波逝世。
description.en: Liu Xia was Liu Xiaobo's second wife. They married in November 1996, and their marriage lasted until his death.

description.zh-cn: 刘陶是刘晓波的儿子。
description.en: Liu Tao is the son of Liu Xiaobo.

description.zh-cn: 刘陶是陶力的儿子。
description.en: Liu Tao is the son of Tao Li.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波是刘伶的儿子。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo is the son of Liu Ling.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波是张素勤的儿子。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo is the son of Zhang Suqin.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波积极参与八九学运，并与周舵、高新、侯德健共同发表《六·二绝食宣言》，在天安门广场绝食，被称为“天安门广场四君子”。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo actively participated in the 1989 student movement, co-authoring the 'June Second Hunger Strike Declaration' with Zhou Duo, Gao Xin, and Hou Dejian, and went on a hunger strike in Tiananmen Square, becoming known as one of the 'Four Gentlemen of Tiananmen Square'.

description.zh-cn: 因参与六四事件，刘晓波于1989年6月6日被拘捕，后被判“反革命宣传煽动罪”，但因说服学生撤离广场的“重大立功表现”而免予刑事处分释放。
description.en: For his involvement in the June Fourth Incident, Liu Xiaobo was arrested on June 6, 1989. He was later convicted of 'counter-revolutionary propaganda and incitement' but was exempted from criminal punishment and released due to his 'major meritorious service' in persuading students to withdraw from the square.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波发起并参与起草《零八宪章》。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo initiated and participated in the drafting of Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 因起草《零八宪章》等活动，刘晓波被以“煽动颠覆国家政权罪”逮捕，并于2009年12月25日被判处有期徒刑11年，直至2017年因肝癌晚期保外就医后逝世。
description.en: For activities including drafting Charter 08, Liu Xiaobo was arrested for 'inciting subversion of state power' and sentenced on December 25, 2009, to 11 years in prison. He was on medical parole for terminal liver cancer when he died in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 向刘晓波颁发2010年诺贝尔和平奖，以表彰其“在中国为基本人权持久而非暴力的奋斗”。
description.en: Awarded the 2010 Nobel Peace Prize to Liu Xiaobo for his "long and non-violent struggle for fundamental human rights in China."

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波于2003年11月当选独立中文笔会第一届会长，并于2005年连任，直至2007年卸任。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo was elected the first president of the Independent Chinese PEN Center in November 2003, was re-elected in 2005, and served until 2007.
